alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 8:19PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Idaho County through 800 PM PDT... At 718 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Grangeville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grangeville, Cottonwood, Ferdinand, Canfield, Winona, Keuterville, Harpster and Fenn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM PDT for central Idaho.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
